name: Legal Aid Society of San Mateo County
description: Free legal help for housing, healthcare access, economic security, immigration, education, and freedom from violence and abuse
fullDescription: The Legal Aid Society of San Mateo County provides free civil legal services to low-income residents, helping protect their rights and improve their lives.
whatTheyOffer:
- Housing law (eviction defense, habitability issues)
- Healthcare access (Medi-Cal, insurance appeals)
- Economic security (public benefits, consumer issues)
- Immigration assistance
- Education rights
- Protection from domestic violence and abuse
howToGetIt:
1. Call the intake line or apply online
2. Complete eligibility screening (income must be 200% FPL or below)
3. Describe your legal issue
4. If eligible, schedule appointment with attorney
5. Receive legal advice, brief services, or full representation
address: 330 Twin Dolphin Drive, Suite 123, Redwood City, CA 94065
